name: Monster Adventure
description: Monsters Adventure Token is a game that involves interactivity, earnings in crypto assets and the latest trend in the crypto world which are the NFTs. The game is present in one of the most widely used blockchain: Binance Smart Chain (BSC) , a unique proposal in the market since it works with crypto assets and their rewards are also in crypto assets. The game is compatible with web3 wallets such as MetaMask, TrustWallet and Binance Chain Extension Wallet, which will be used to accept transactions and pay for gas fees.
